title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

Richard B. Anderson [Arlington, Massachusetts] admits to having concocted, with the help of Joseph Zelan, a new cocktail made from Manischewitz wine and tomato juice. Its name, of course, is the Oyvay Maria.
preview:
